website_summaries.verdict: Whether for dry or winter roads, the new iteration of the Reebok Classic Leather shoes makes it possible for safe and comfortable gait. As the name implies, the Reebok Classic Leather Ripple Trail is equipped with a rippled outsole that delivers excellent traction.Also, this new kick carries a fashion-forward silhouette that can complement several everyday outfits. With excellent durability, it is available in different lovely colorways for both genders.
pros: The Reebok Classic Leather Ripple Trails has a chic silhouette that is admired by plenty of customers
Many users have stated that it is among the comfortable Reebok sneakers they have
This updated version of the Reebok Classic Leather Ripple is available in a variety of eye-appealing color variations that are liked by many purchasers
A couple of testers say they appreciate that the shoe can be used and held up in winter road
The low-top Reebok Classic Leather Ripple Trail is long-lasting and of good quality, according to several reviewers
A few have applauded the soft and bouncy feel that this kick provides
From the growing collection of Reebok Classic Leather sneakers, this shoe offers excellent arch support that is pointed out by a couple of wearers
Most reviewers have shared that they would recommend the Reebok Classic Leather Ripple Trail shoes to their friends and families
cons: One buyer has noted that she is disappointed because the shoelaces easily get untied
A few find the Ripple Trail version of the Classic Leather to be a bit wider than they are used to

customer_reviews.title: Small and Squeaky
customer_reviews.text: I wear 11.5 in Reebok Harmans. These run a half size too small in relation to those, so order up a half size if you want these. Before you buy them, you should know they squeak whenever you walk on a hard surface, such as tiles, wood, concrete, etc. So unless you plan on wearing these while standing on only carpet, I would not recommend the ripple style outsole, even though they do look nice.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I have not owned Reeboks since I was a teen. I became exclusively Nike. In recent years the comfort of Nike Air products has not been as good as I was used to. I decided to try these as comfort is key at this stage of my life. I am very happy I did. in fact I purchased two additional pairs in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: dawebhead

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Only had them a couple weeks. I think they are very comfortable. Good cushion when walking. Lightweight. I like the colors. The only I dont care for is the laces. They are round and thin. I have to double knot them or they come untied sporadically. This is easily and cheaply fixed. Great shoes so far.
customer_reviews.author: KeepItGreen

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, the Reebok Men's CL Leather Ripple Trail are comfortable shoes, I like the color and how they look, so if you are people who really enjoy wearing Rebook classics this is your ideal choice. The quality of the entire product exceeds all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but has minimal support
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and attractive but felt thin with minimal support. Laces are extremely long and may cause a tripping hazard. Nice athletic style shoes to wear around the house, not for running or extended walks.
customer_reviews.author: Spoke36

customer_reviews.title: Not actually a classic feel.
customer_reviews.text: They look great.very soft to walk in but they are not at all like wearing an original classic.its all I wear and I seen these and liked the colors.and the material.but once I put them on they seem bigger almost like a boot feeling to me.but for the money I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: s haskins

customer_reviews.title: The sole lift off
customer_reviews.text: The sole lift off in the back side of one shoe,in less than two months of using them. If I could I would return then but I live in Costa Rica.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus cerisola

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Great for everyday or when running extended errands. Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great grip on the bottom for snow or ice
customer_reviews.text: I loved these but returned them coz the girl version with the pink laces came back in stock. These are great in the sleet or snow, great grip.
customer_reviews.author: regina swanson

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, true to fit, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and comfortable. Got them for a great price and they just have a unique look to them that are great with dark jeans or khakis to mix it up. Also held up in winter conditions when it’s dry out.
customer_reviews.author: W. A.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers were a little tight when I first put them on. They have relaxed after walking for a while and are extremely comfortable. Very Good price for this shoe, I will buy another pair when these wear out!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mc

customer_reviews.title: Perfection.
customer_reviews.text: After eyeing these shoes for awhile I finally went for it when they were on sale. I typically wear a 10.5 or 11 women's shoe so I ordered this men's shoe in a sz 9 and they fit perfectly. They're super comfy, the laces stay tied and I love the colorway. Delightful!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie V.

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and comes with extra shoe laces very happy
customer_reviews.text: I love how comfortable these shoes are and To my surprise they come with really cool red shoe laces that I a put on em that makes them look way better .
customer_reviews.author: MrMandoMusica1973

customer_reviews.title: Nice Reebok lifestyle shous
customer_reviews.text: Thanks 4 fast delivery..the shous is nice and fit as aspects🙂 I will get another colour soon.. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Army4Ever

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and look at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to have comfortable footwear at work. The shoes are very comfortable for being on your feet all day, and they go well with casual clothing as well. Some people thought I paid way more than I actually did for them, something to consider before going big on sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: No arch support
customer_reviews.text: They need some breaking in. Little tight in front. Need incerts otherwise no support at all. Get what you pay for. I still like them.
customer_reviews.author: Virg

customer_reviews.title: Get them! Ugly yes but super comfortable for trails
customer_reviews.text: Honestly these are one of the most comfortable shoes you can wear.
customer_reviews.author: rudy4570

customer_reviews.title: Foot Anchors
customer_reviews.text: The shoestrings are hard to keep tied. They have an elastic quality that makes one "feel" that they are tight but soon after come loose. Go Figure.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hufford

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Lace holder broke the first time I tried to pull up to tie
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Well ,i like the shoes they fit perfect. Wath i was disappointed it was when i tried to tie my shoe the first time,one of the eyelets ripped tath sucks! But anyways you got wath you pay for. I got a good deal.but comfortable shoes thx,dhipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Joel R.

customer_reviews.title: Stitching where tongue meets shoe is raised and irritates my foot
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very narrow, I normally wear a size 10.5 and had to order an 11.5 so they run small in size
customer_reviews.author: Martin Harper

customer_reviews.title: Handsome sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Another pair of shoes you can't keep tied for 1 block. Have to double knot like a kindergartner
customer_reviews.author: grey one

customer_reviews.title: Men’s to women’s size conversion
customer_reviews.text: My size- Women’s size 8. So I purchased a Men’s size 6 and it was too small. I had to exchange for men’s size 7. Reebok men’s to women’s size conversion is off by one size.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Dope
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look good on the feet and are super comfortable. Can’t beat them for the price
customer_reviews.author: Brent F.

customer_reviews.title: Reebok
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. They are comfortable and a great look. Only thing is the lace strings are weak and breaks easily.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Lee

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: Don’t even bother. Shoes is too large. It’s like putting a chicken leg on a boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The size is acceptable but not a comfortable fit. The price is right. I am not going to buy Reebok next time.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Trendy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are trendy and comfortable. They got true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: Runs true to size.. Thought they would run smaller so got size up.. Was just a tad big but for the price $25 just added another insole fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Quality and size
customer_reviews.text: The item is really good, the size i ordered is fitted perfectly and the price worth it, i recomend actually
customer_reviews.author: Shorena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: More than what I wanted Get a compliment every time I wear them! Brand new Perfect box
customer_reviews.author: Devin Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers are as described, high quality and fits with sizes
customer_reviews.text: My brother loves it ^_^ Bought for BF as well ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I get good  products  on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This reebok classic is nice I love it right fit
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Skeen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design
customer_reviews.text: They are reflective and come with two sets of laces (black and red).
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Shoes is on point I love it, all eyes are on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Classic Leather Sneaker
product_meta.description: Introduced in 1983, the Classic Leather debuted as a running shoe. Like the original, these men's shoes are made of premium leather for a soft feel and glove-like fit. They're finished with contrast color trim and metal details.
feature_bullets: Suede and textile upper with reflective details
Traditional laces re-enforced with tongue webbing and ghillies; Webbing heel loop
Rubberized mud guard on toe cap
Stitched-on Reebok window label on the side
